basic.description: In this course, topics include food spoilage and food poisoning, food-borne pathogens, food laws and regulations, HACCP and safe food handler practices, with an emphasis on current issues related to the quality and safety of food.
basic.subject: FOS
basic.title: Food Safety and Quality

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: FOS 3026 and HUN 1201, or departmental permission.
